2025-05-13PMOOther Than Statutory AuthorityActing Ministers MinuteAppointment of those Cabinet Ministers who may act for the Prime Minister if he is unable to do so, as well as Acting Ministers for all the statutory portfolios.N/A
subject: Acting Ministers Minute
precis: Appointment of those Cabinet Ministers who may act for the Prime Minister if he is unable to do so, as well as Acting Ministers for all the statutory portfolios.
